desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.jp: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.thai: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.ko: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.
desc.zh_tw: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校對策委員會社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师被白子救出来之后，抵达阿拜多斯高中的废校对策委员会社团活动室。然而当时片方头盔圈却来攻击阿拜多斯高中，于是老师就和学生们一起出面击退他们。

desc.en: At the moment when Sensei is out of options, Sensei meets Shiroko.
desc.jp: At the moment when Sensei is out of options, Sensei meets Shiroko.
desc.thai: At the moment when Sensei is out of options, Sensei meets Shiroko.
desc.ko: At the moment when Sensei is out of options, Sensei meets Shiroko.
desc.zh_tw: 就在老师穷途末路之际，老师遇到了白子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在老师穷途末路之际，老师遇到了白子。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在老师穷途末路之际，老师遇到了白子。

desc.en: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.jp: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.thai: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.ko: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.
desc.zh_tw: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。

desc.en: After carrying Sensei to the Foreclosure Task Force's office, Sensei makes it clear of his identity.
desc.jp: After carrying Sensei to the Foreclosure Task Force's office, Sensei makes it clear of his identity.
desc.thai: After carrying Sensei to the Foreclosure Task Force's office, Sensei makes it clear of his identity.
desc.ko: After carrying Sensei to the Foreclosure Task Force's office, Sensei makes it clear of his identity.
desc.zh_tw: 将老师背到對策委員會办公室后，老师向众人表明了自己是夏萊老师的身份。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 将老师背到对策委员会办公室后，老师向众人表明了自己是夏莱老师的身份。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 将老师背到对策委员会办公室后，老师向众人表明了自己是夏莱老师的身份。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 将老师背到对策委员会办公室后，老师向众人表明了自己是沙勒老师的身份。

desc.en: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.
desc.jp: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.
desc.thai: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.
desc.ko: When everyone is about to discuss, gunshots are heard outside; it turns out that the Helmet Gang is attacking Abydos again. Sensei stays in the clubroom to give commands, while others initialize the battle.
desc.zh_tw: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在部室进行指挥。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在部室进行指挥。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在众人准备讨论事务时，外面突然响起枪声，原来是头盔圈又来进攻阿拜多斯了。众人立刻开始作战，老师则留在部室进行指挥。
